sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import subscriptions from '../subscriptions' const SubscriptionPlan = ({ match }) => { const [subscription, setSubscription] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function getsubscription(){ const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/subscriptions/${match.params.id}`) setSubscription(data) } getsubscription() }, []) return (
Go Back

{subscription.name}

{subscription.duration} days

 Price: Rs. {subscription.price} Description: {subscription.description} Features: {subscription.features} Price: Rs.{subscription.price}
) } export default SubscriptionPlan
